data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It's MLDBM based module - it allows to store/manage data, the data
    is organized in associated tables, for each table, record structure
    (fields, and something like one-to-many relation if needed) is
    defined. There are methods to define data structure, to
    append/update, get, delete, count records. So it's something like
    database.
